panels.title: What is the average time from first commit on a branch till it is deployed?

targets.rawSql:
with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.merged_date as pr_merged_date,
    -- convert null to 0 if a PR has no cycle_time to make sure cycle_time equals the sum of the four metrics below
		coalesce(prm.pr_cycle_time/3600,0) as cycle_time
  FROM pull_requests pr
    left join project_pr_metrics prm on pr.id = prm.id
    join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.merged_date)
    and pr.created_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
    and pm.project_name in (${project})
  GROUP BY 1,2,3
)

SELECT 
  DATE_ADD(date(pr_merged_date), INTERVAL - $interval(date(pr_merged_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  avg(cycle_time) as 'PR Cycle Time(d)'
FROM _prs
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: PR Cycle Time for Merged PRs

targets.rawSql:
with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.merged_date as pr_merged_date,
    -- convert null to 0 if a PR has no coding_time to make sure cycle_time equals the sum of the four sub-metrics
		coalesce(prm.pr_coding_time/1440,0) as coding_time
  FROM pull_requests pr
    left join project_pr_metrics prm on pr.id = prm.id
    join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.merged_date)
    and pr.merged_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
    and pm.project_name in (${project})
  GROUP BY 1,2,3
)

SELECT 
  DATE_ADD(date(pr_merged_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(pr_merged_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  avg(coding_time) as 'Coding Time(days)'
FROM _prs
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: From initial commit to PR raised

targets.rawSql:
with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.merged_date as pr_merged_date,
    -- convert null to 0 if a PR has no pickup_time to make sure cycle_time equals the sum of the four sub-metrics
		coalesce(prm.pr_pickup_time/1440,0) as pickup_time
  FROM pull_requests pr
    left join project_pr_metrics prm on pr.id = prm.id
    join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.merged_date)
    and pr.merged_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
    and pm.project_name in (${project})
  GROUP BY 1,2,3
)

SELECT 
  DATE_ADD(date(pr_merged_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(pr_merged_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  avg(pickup_time) as 'Pickup Time(days)'
FROM _prs
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: From PR raised to first comment

targets.rawSql:
with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.merged_date as pr_merged_date,
    -- convert null to 0 if a PR has no review_time to make sure cycle_time equals the sum of the four sub-metrics
		coalesce(prm.pr_review_time/1440,0) as review_time
  FROM pull_requests pr
    left join project_pr_metrics prm on pr.id = prm.id
    join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pr.merged_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
    and pm.project_name in (${project})
  GROUP BY 1,2,3
)

SELECT 
  DATE_ADD(date(pr_merged_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(pr_merged_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  avg(review_time) as 'Review Time(days)'
FROM _prs
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: From first comment to PR merged

targets.rawSql:
with _prs as(
  SELECT
    pr.id,
    pr.merged_date as pr_merged_date,
    -- convert null to 0 if a PR has no deploy_time to make sure cycle_time equals the sum of the four sub-metrics
		coalesce(prm.pr_deploy_time/1440,0) as deploy_time
  FROM pull_requests pr
    left join project_pr_metrics prm on pr.id = prm.id
    join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.merged_date)
    and pr.merged_date >= DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD($__timeFrom(), INTERVAL -DAY($__timeFrom())+1 DAY), INTERVAL +1 MONTH)
    and pm.project_name in (${project})
  GROUP BY 1,2,3
)

SELECT 
  DATE_ADD(date(pr_merged_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(pr_merged_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  avg(deploy_time) as 'PR Deploy Time(days)'
FROM _prs
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(pr.created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(pr.created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  count(distinct pr.id) as "PR: Opened",
  count(distinct case when pr.merged_date is not null then id else null end) as "PR: Merged"
FROM pull_requests pr
  join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
  and pm.project_name in (${project})
group by 1

with _pr_commits_data as(
  SELECT
    DATE_ADD(date(pr.created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(pr.created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
    pr.id as pr_id,
    pr.merge_commit_sha,
    sum(c.additions)+sum(c.deletions) as loc
  FROM 
    pull_requests pr
 left join commits c on pr.merge_commit_sha = c.sha
    join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
    and pm.project_name in (${project})
 and pr.status = 'MERGED'
    group by 1,2,3
)

SELECT 
  time,
  sum(loc)/count(distinct pr_id) as 'PR Merged Size'
FROM _pr_commits_data
GROUP BY 1

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(pr.created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(pr.created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  sum(case when pr.id not in (SELECT pull_request_id FROM pull_request_comments) then 1 else 0 end) as "PRs Merged without comments"
FROM 
  pull_requests pr
  join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
  and pm.project_name in (${project})
  and pr.merged_date is not null
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Avg. number of PRs merged without comments

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DATE_ADD(date(pr.created_date), INTERVAL -$interval(date(pr.created_date))+1 DAY) as time,
  count(distinct prc.id)/count(distinct pr.id) as "PR Review Depth"
FROM 
  pull_requests pr
  left join pull_request_comments prc on pr.id = prc.pull_request_id
  join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos' 
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(pr.created_date)
  and pm.project_name in (${project})
  and pr.merged_date is not null
group by 1

panels.title: Avg. number of comments per PR

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    pr.title,
    pr.merged_date as pr_merged_date,
    -- convert null to 0 if a PR has no cycle_time to make sure cycle_time equals the sum of the four metrics below
		coalesce(prm.pr_cycle_time/1440,0) as 'Cycle Time (days)',
        sum(c.additions) + sum(c.deletions) as 'PR Size (loc)'
  FROM pull_requests pr
    left join project_pr_metrics prm on pr.id = prm.id
    left join commits c on pr.merge_commit_sha = c.sha
    join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos'
  WHERE
    pr.merged_date between now() - INTERVAL 36 Month and now() - INTERVAL 24 Month
    and pm.project_name in (${project})
  GROUP BY pr.id, pr.merged_date, prm.pr_cycle_time

SELECT
    pr.title,
    pr.merged_date as pr_merged_date,
    -- convert null to 0 if a PR has no cycle_time to make sure cycle_time equals the sum of the four metrics below
		coalesce(prm.pr_review_time/1440,0) as 'Review Time (days)',
        sum(c.additions) + sum(c.deletions) as 'PR Size (loc)'
  FROM pull_requests pr
    left join project_pr_metrics prm on pr.id = prm.id
    left join commits c on pr.merge_commit_sha = c.sha
    join project_mapping pm on pr.base_repo_id = pm.row_id and pm.table = 'repos'
  WHERE
    pr.merged_date between now() - INTERVAL 36 Month and now() - INTERVAL 24 Month
    and pm.project_name in (${project})
  GROUP BY pr.id, pr.merged_date, prm.pr_review_time

list.definition: select distinct priority from issues where priority != ''
list.label: P0+P1 Priority
list.name: priority
list.query: select distinct priority from issues where priority != ''

title: Where is time spent on the path to production?
